# See https://github.com/scisoft/autocmake/

# set minimum cmake version
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.3 FATAL_ERROR)

# project name
project(pcmsolver)

# do not rebuild if rules (compiler flags) change
set(CMAKE_SKIP_RULE_DEPENDENCY TRUE)

# if CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE undefined, we set it to Debug
if(NOT CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE)
    set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE "Debug")
endif()

# directories which hold included cmake modules
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/custom)
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/custom/compilers)
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH} ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/downloaded)

# included cmake modules
include(autocmake_cxx)
include(autocmake_cc)
include(autocmake_fc)
include(Fortran_C)
include(CheckCXX11)
include(GNU.CXX)
include(Clang.CXX)
include(Intel.CXX)
include(GNU.C)
include(Clang.C)
include(Intel.C)
include(GNU.Fortran)
include(Intel.Fortran)
include(autocmake_code_coverage)
include(autocmake_int64)
include(autocmake_omp)
include(autocmake_safeguards)
include(autocmake_python_interpreter)
include(pcmsolver)
include(boost_version-components)
include(autocmake_boost)
include(version)
include(catch)
include(cloc)
include(eigen)
include(libgetkw)
include(libtaylor)
include(zlib)
include(documentation)
include(api)
include(autocmake_src)
include(autogenerated)
include(include_dirs)
include(test)
include(merge_static_libs)
include(summary)
